description: Kevin Smith passionately discusses the Dark Knight with other Caped Crusader creators and fans.

episodes.description: Kevin & Marc return to the Scum & Villainy Cantina to talkKevin's Green Hornet news, the latest in pop culture news, and how to not Scaramucci yourself.

episodes.description: Kevin & Marc reconvene at the Scum & Villainy Cantina to talk about the latest news to come out of San Diego Comic-Con @ Home and more!

episodes.title: 290: FatMan Beyond LIVE! 7/17/20
episodes.description: Kevin & Marc return to the Scum & Villainy Cantina to talk about the latest and greatest in entertainment news.

episodes.title: 289: Greg Rucka! - FatMan Beyond LIVE!
episodes.description: Kevin & Marc return to the Scum & Villainy Cantina to talk the latest entertainment news right after talking to Greg Rucka about many things including The Old Guard, starring Charlize Theron, that is now available on Netflix.

episodes.title: 288: Ray Fisher Spills Justice League Tea - FatMan Beyond LIVE!
episodes.description: Kevin & Marc return to the Scum & Villainy Cantina to talk the latest entertainment news including the passing of Carl Reiner and Ray Fisher's comments about Joss Whedon from the Justice League reshoots.

episodes.title: 287: Michael Keaton Back as Batman? - FatMan Beyond LIVE!
episodes.description: Kevin & Marc return to the Scum & Villainy Cantina to talk about the potential return of Michael Keaton in the upcoming Flash movie as the Bruce Wayne from Tim Burton's Batman films, plus some of the other latest and greatest happenings in entertainment and geek news.

episodes.title: 286: Denny O'Neil - In His Own Words
episodes.description: In which we look back on a conversation with comic book legend Denny O'Neill. This episode is built from the interview featured on Fat Man on Batman episodes 60 - 62.

episodes.title: 285: FatMan Beyond LIVE! 6/11/20
episodes.description: Kevin & Marc return to the Scum & Villainy Cantina to talk Bill & Ted 3, Marc’s got big news about #ThePlagueNerdalogues, and Kevin will tell you about #MoobysPopUp! How about that Miles Morales PS5 news?

episodes.title: 284: Live from the Quarantina, 5/30/20
episodes.description: Kevin and Marc return to the Scum & Villainy Quarantina to talk about the news of the day, the entertainment news, and delve into some interesting Potter fan fic.

episodes.title: 283: Ben Affleck & The Snyder Cut!
episodes.description: Kevin and Marc return to the Scum & Villainy Quarantina to get into very Bat-centric news after hearing from Ben Affleck regarding the Snyder Cut.

episodes.title: 282: FatMan Strikes Back: An Empire Strikes Back Watch Party
episodes.description: Kevin and Marc watch and enjoy The Empire Strikes Back, from Scum & Villainy's May the 4th 24 Hour Live Stream, and brought to you today in honor of the 40th anniversary of the release of Empire on May 21, 1980.

episodes.title: 281: Special Guest Chris Wood!
episodes.description: Kevin and Marc return to the Scum & Villainy Quarantina to talk all things geek and pop culture after a chat with special guest, and the voice of Prince Adam / He-Man for Netflix's Masters of the Universe: Revelation, Chris Wood!

episodes.title: 280: Special Guest CW's Stargirl Brec Bassinger!
episodes.description: Kevin and Marc return to the Scum & Villainy Quarantina to talk all things geek and pop culture after a chat with special guest, and star of the CW's Stargirl, Brec Bassinger!

episodes.title: 279: Special Guest Steve Geppi
episodes.description: Kevin and Marc return to the Scum & Villainy Quarantina to talk all things geek and pop culture after a chat with special guest Steve Geppi.

episodes.title: 278: Special Guest Jim Lee!
episodes.description: Kevin and Marc return to the Scum & Villainy Quarantina to talk all thing geek and pop culture while raising money for Book Industry Charitable Foundation (Binc) to support the fight to save indie book stores, with a little bit of help from special guest and comic legend Jim Lee.

episodes.title: 277: Live from the Quarantina, Too
episodes.description: Kevin and Marc return to a safe social distance from one another inside an audience-less Scum & Villainy Quarantina (Cantina) to talk about what's happening in the worlds of entertainment and pop culture.

episodes.title: 276: Live from the Quarantina
episodes.description: Kevin and Marc social distance themselves inside an audience-less Scum & Villainy Quarantina (Cantina) to talk about what's happening in the worlds of entertainment and pop culture.

episodes.title: 275: The Batman, Picard, The Last of Us
episodes.description: Kevin Smith returns to the Scum & Villainy Cantina with Marc Bernardin to talk about: - Jay and Silent Bob Reboot - Eddie Murphy - Marc’s job on The Continental - Marc’s job on Picard - High Fidelity - Invisible Man - Dr. Mage from Infinity War & End Game - Swallow - Marc’s Film Series ‘Minority Report’ - Max von Sydow - Robert Pattinson's The Batman - Thor: Love and Thunder - Spider-Man universe spin off - Whiplash’s Sound Mixer - Mark Ruffalo in She Hulk TV Show - Dr Doolittle - Taika Waititi’s Willy Wonka cartoons - James Bond’s delay - SxSW Cancled - Beauty and the Beast Spin off - The Last of Us - Kumail Nanjiani - Q&A

episodes.title: 274: Blackman Beyond: The Walking Dead’s Khary Payton
episodes.description: The final episode of Blackman Beyond for this winter is here! Listen to Marc hold court with Khary Payton of The Walking Dead. Marc and Khary offer hilarious and fun insights into the world of geekdom, live from the Scum and Villainy Cantina in Hollywood, CA.

episodes.title: 273: Blackman Beyond: Dani Fernandez, Ben Blacker, Marc Evan Jackson
episodes.description: Dani Fernandez co-hosts this week with Marc while Kevin is away on the Reboot Roadshow. Marc and Dani also welcome special guests: Ben Blacker and Marc Evan Jackson.
